title: [Large-Scale] Personalized Learning Strategy Design Through Dental Students' Understanding of Cultural Dimensions

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational dental medicine knowledge and general understanding of learning theories
context.additional_context: Humanities-based instructional design reflecting students' cultural characteristics (uncertainty avoidance tendency, long-term goal orientation, collaborative learning preference), promoting self-directed learning through heuristic activities in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Students can analyze their learning styles by applying Hofstede's cultural dimensions theory
Learners achieve a problem-solving success rate of over 85% in structured dental practice scenarios that account for uncertainty avoidance tendencies.
Through team-based project execution, learners produce learning outcomes reflecting long-term goal orientation and collectivist characteristics with over 90% participation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
